1. Describe your app concept or functionality in detail, 2. Mention the target platforms (iOS, Android, web) and devices, 3. Indicate essential features (authentication, payments, social sharing), 4. Provide any UI/UX preferences or wireframes, 5. Outline your development timeline and key milestones, 6. Specify your budget and resource constraints, 7. Let me know if you have a preferred tech stack (React Native, Swift, Flutter), 8. Clarify if you need backend setup or existing APIs, 9. Note if you require post-launch maintenance or support, 10. Confirm how you measure success (number of downloads, revenue, user retention)
